name: Coinvise
introduce: Coinvise is a no-code platform for creators, communities and brands to launch a token, create airdrop campaigns and monetize with NFT memberships. Our tooling helps creators reward community participation using airdrops and compose NFT powered memberships tiers that unlock exclusive perks or benefits. Coinvise offers three no-code tools — token (launch a community token), airdrop (create a claim page or distribute tokens/NFTs for rewarding participation) and NFT memberships (launch and monetize NFT powered membership tiers that unlock special perks and benefits for community members).
